segments.text: I see the entire kitchen laid out from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel on the plate, serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her; she steps in it unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl beside him, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating quietly, avoiding mom's notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light on the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence look tidy out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside contrasts so much with potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for them; hope nothing bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes and cookies—simple joys amid risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
